plot: Imanol is four years old. Alert and imaginative, cruel and innocent, the only thing that matters to him is to survive. Upon anything and anyone.
title: Hemen Nago
plot_es: Imanol is four years old. Alert and imaginative, cruel and innocent, the only thing that matters to him is to survive. Upon anything and anyone.
plot_en: Imanol is four years old. Alert and imaginative, cruel and innocent, the only thing that matters to him is to survive. Upon anything and anyone.
